txt.en: DNT
Talk to Watcyn
A man named Watcyn has found himself in strange circumstances.
Watcyn has asked you to rifle through Rendal's belongings, which are lying next to the tent.
Return to Rendal in in Sírlond
Rendal has asked you to help him gather athelas.\n\nAthelas grows around the pool near Sírlond, to the east.
Unlikely Acquaintances
The injured man calls out to you
Examine Rendal's weapons
Collect athelas ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Watcyn
DNT
Rendal's bow and dagger are worn but clearly cared for
Athelas collected ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT
Examine Rendal's maps
DNT

'Maps and weapons.... No ordinary traveller would go around seeking danger. D'you think he's one of them Rangers?\n\n'They're too mysterious for my liking. Always avoiding other folks, coming and going to do who-knows-what. 'Course I don't like them.'
You have collected enough athelas.\n\nYou should return to Rendal in Sírlond.

'Oi, you're the [placeholder] Rendal mentioned, yeah? He's still gone. Said you and him were picking kingsfoil. What's a weed got to do with my wounds?

'Never mind, I haven't got a mind for healing and the like. Just give it here, and I'll make sure Rendal receives it.

'That man's a strange one; he carried me out of Caranost and still hasn't asked for a reward. What kind of person would venture into an Orc-infested ruin and -- erm, you're asking how I ended up there myself? The Orcs, of course!

'What I mean to say is, there's got to be a catch to Rendal's kindness. Come on, aren't you just a bit curious? His belongings are just lying over there, next to the tent!

'I'd go digging around myself, but -- ' Watcyn winces. 'Well, you get the idea.'

'Hail, traveller. Do you know of athelas? Kingsfoil, I mean. The weed?

'I found this man -- Watcyn -- injured in Caranost. I need to stay a bit longer to keep an eye on him, but once his condition has steadied, I'll go looking for athelas.

'We could work together to gather more -- if you don't mind, that is. There should be athelas growing around the pool nearby, just to the east.'
Rendal hasn't returned, but the injured man he was tending to -- Watcyn -- wishes to speak to you.
Points of interest and dangerous locations in Cardolan are marked

'Hail, traveller. Have you any athelas?

'I found this man -- Watcyn -- injured in Caranost. I need to stay a bit longer to keep an eye on him, but once his condition has steadied, I'll go looking for athelas.

'We could work together to gather more -- if you don't mind, that is. There should be athelas growing around the pool nearby, just to the east.'
Rendal's belongings have given you a better idea of what kind of person he is.\n\nYou should tell Watcyn.
